text: [dramatic intro music]

Ferrari is one of the most famous
luxury brands.

Our story in racing,
in sports cars, and lifestyle too,

allows us to be the most famous
brand in the world.

Starting from last year,
we faced some problems
regarding our datacenter footprint
because we need to provide

hundreds of virtual desktop
infrastructure solutions
to our end users, our partners.

So when we started
considering Amazon WorkSpaces,

we had the opportunity
to encrypt our data at rest.

So this is
a very important aspect to consider

when developing
an end user solution.

One of the benefits
introduced by Amazon WorkSpaces

is the license included model
in the pay-as-you-go.

In this way,
we do not need to commit
on a long-term licensing model.

We deprovision the device
to our end user,
we also deprovision the license.

So in this way, we avoid
focusing on managing licenses.

AWS provides an opportunity
to combine other AWS services.
So for example, we leveraged

the AWS System Manager
Maintenance Window, AWS Lambda,
and thanks to those services,

we had the opportunity to develop
an automatic provisioning solution.

This is a solution we provide
to our external partners,
our external collaborators.

They, of course,
came from many parts of the world.

Thanks to the global availability
of WorkSpaces,

we can reach
our end users in this way.
In our on-premises solution,

we took days for providing
a virtual desktop infrastructure.

Now we can provide
in more or less one hour.
And thanks to this solution,

we have reached the goal
to reduce by 90 percent,

the time to provide
a VDI solution to an end user.

Amazon WorkSpaces has been
a great solution for our end users.
[engine revving]
[music fades]
